original_title: 営業課長の湿ったパンスト 里美ゆりあ
overview: Satomi was unfortunately transferred from the director of the design department to the manager of the sales department. A big job entrusted to me by the director who supports her Satomi. However, the introduced client, Mitsui, asked for her Satomi's body.
title: Sales Department Manager's Wet Pantyhose. Yuria Satomi.
